titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the rate of percentage depletion for oil and gas wells to 27 1/2 percent.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/16/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of the percentage depletion allowance for oil and gas wells from 15 percent to 27 1/2 percent.
